Package com.charliai.activities.api

Class ActivityMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.charliai.activities.api.ActivityMessage
  • public class ActivityMessage
extends java.lang.Object
    The ActivityMessage class is responsible for generating and managing standard messages and message formats between the activities and the external interfaces. This class will construct standard message structures as well as manage responses.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ActivityMessage()
      Creates an empty status message object.
      ActivityMessage​(java.lang.String message)
      Creates a new message object with the body of the message passed as a JSON string.
      ActivityMessage​(java.lang.String status, java.lang.String statusMessage)
      Creates a new message object and sets the status as well as the status message.
      ActivityMessage​(org.json.JSONObject message)
      Creates a new message object with the JSON body.

        Returns:

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus​(java.lang.String code)
               throws ActivityException
        Sets the message status and should be one of the valid status codes.
        Parameters:
        code - String for the new status code
        Throws:
        ActivityException

      • getStatusMessage

        public java.lang.String getStatusMessage()
        Gets the current status message such as an error message or a success message.
        Returns:
        The simple status included in the message

      • setStatusMessage

        public void setStatusMessage​(java.lang.String statusMessage)
        Sets the status message for the object and should be a friendly message that reports a success or error message.
        Parameters:
        statusMessage - The simple status string to include in a message

      • getResponse

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getResponse()
        Creates a standardized response message and returns a JAX-RS Response object. The HTTP response is tailored based on the status and will send a 200 response if good, a 400 response on an error and 500 response on an exception. Warnings will also be set to a HTTP 200 response code.
        Returns:
        Response object containing the message

      • send

        public org.json.JSONObject send​(java.lang.String url)
                         throws ActivityException
        Helper method to quickly send an activity message. This method will send an HTTP POST and return a JSON Object response. Note that the message status must either be SUCCESS, CONTINUE, WARNING or ERROR. A status of UNKNOWN or EXCEPTION will result in an exception being thrown.
        Returns:
        JSONObject response
        Throws:
        ActivityException

      • httpGetRequest

        public static org.json.JSONObject httpGetRequest​(java.lang.String url)
                                          throws ActivityException
        The httpGetRequest method can be used by ActivityConfig Handlers to make service calls.
        Parameters:
        url - String URL to send the GET request
        Returns:
        JSONObject response
        Throws:
        ActivityException

        Parameters:

        JSONObject response
